ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:15}); // {Cloud}
“Rufus and the other's plan was a failure…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:23}); // {Cloud}
“I've…been thinking, too.
About the universe…planet…ocean.”{PAUSE}“How wide and big…
No matter where I go and what I do
it won't change a thing.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:39}); // {Cloud}
“It's the Planet's scream.
I'm sure of it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:40}); // {Cloud}
“Hey, how do we know that this is
really the Planet's scream?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:53}); // {Cloud}
“The new weapon should stop him, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:76}); // {Cloud}
“Northern Cave…”{PAUSE}“Let's go see what
happened to it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:53}); // {Cloud}
“The new weapon should stop him, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:72}); // {Cloud}
“OK! Let's go!
We'll beat Weapon ourselves!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:74}); // {Cloud}
“How would I know?”{PAUSE}“But that's no reason for us
to just let him go!”{PAUSE}“We're goin' to {CYAN}Midgar{WHITE} and fight Weapon!
Come on, let's move!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:79}); // {Cloud}
“Meteor's gonna fall in about…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:81}); // {Cloud}
“{Red XIII}…”{PAUSE}“You want to see everyone in
Cosmo Canyon again?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:83}); // {Cloud}
“You want to see Marlene, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:85}); // {Cloud}
“We'll beat Sephiroth…”{PAUSE}“Then, if we don't release
the power of Holy in seven days…”{PAUSE}“There won't be
a Planet left to protect.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:86}); // {Cloud}
“If we can't beat Sephiroth…”{PAUSE}“It's as good as death for us.”{PAUSE}“We'll just go a few days sooner
than the rest who'll die from Meteor.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:90}); // {Cloud}
“What are we all fighting for?
I want us all to understand that.”{PAUSE}“Save the Planet…for the future of the Planet…
Sure, that's all fine.”{PAUSE}“But really, is that how it is?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:91}); // {Cloud}
“For me, this is a personal feud.”{PAUSE}“I want to beat Sephiroth
and settle my past.”{PAUSE}“Saving the Planet just happens
to be part of that.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:93}); // {Cloud}
“I think we all are
fighting for ourselves.”{PAUSE}“For ourselves…and that someone…
something…whatever
it is, that's important to us.”{PAUSE}“That's what we're fighting for.”{PAUSE}“That's why we keep up this
battle for the Planet.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:96}); // {Cloud}
“Go and see her.
Make sure you're right, and come back.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:97}); // {Cloud}
“All of you. Get off the ship
and find out your reasons for yourselves.”{PAUSE}“I want you to make sure.
Then I want you to come back.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:100}); // {Cloud}
“What are you going to do, {Tifa}?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:129}); // {Cloud}
“I'm sure she wanted to give
her life for the Planet.”

ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:140}); // {Cloud}
“…I just can't say it that easy.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:124}); // {Tifa}
“How are you feeling?”{PAUSE}“You ought to rest a bit…
Don't push yourself.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:125}); // {Tifa}
“{Cloud}…what should I do?
I've got to think.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:128}); // {Tifa}
“I wonder what {Aeris} felt…
when she was on that altar…?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:130}); // {Tifa}
“Really? I wonder?
I don't think that was it.”{PAUSE}“I don't think she wanted to die at all,
but was planning on coming back all along.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:131}); // “She always used to talk
about the 'next time'.”{PAUSE}“She talked about the future
more than any of us…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:132}); // {Tifa}
“Although she never said anything to us
about it, she must've had a rough life.”{PAUSE}“I think {Aeris} looked
forward to tomorrow and
the future more than anyone…”{PAUSE}“…she must've had many
many dreams…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:134}); // {Tifa}
“Whether you love it or hate it…”{PAUSE}“You just can't bring yourself
to leave Midgar, can you?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:135}); // {Tifa}
“Now we're going to fight Sephiroth.”{PAUSE}“I wonder what the inside of that cave looks like?
You think Sephiroth is just sitting there
waiting for Meteor?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:136}); // {Tifa}
“It's all right.”{PAUSE}“You're here…
Everyone's all together”{PAUSE}“Together…we can do anything.
We've worked this hard already.”

ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:38}); // {Tifa}
“Maybe it's the Planet's scream…
Or is it Meteor?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:41}); // {Tifa}
“Did you forget?”{PAUSE}“Bugenhagen told us.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:67}); // {Tifa}
“{Cait Sith}…
{Barret}, he knows what he did.”{PAUSE}“What we did in Midgar can't be forgotten
no matter what the reason.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:68}); // {Tifa}
“Right?
We haven't forgotten, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:69}); // {Tifa}
“I know you.”{PAUSE}“You can't quit the company because you're
worried about the people in Midgar, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:101}); // {Tifa}
“Did you forget?”{PAUSE}“I'm…all alone.
I don't have anywhere to go.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:141}); // {Tifa}
“Now I feel like things are really
going to be all right.”{PAUSE}“Thanks, {Cloud}.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:142}); // {Tifa}
“You're right, things will be all right.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:143}); // {Tifa}
“I'm sorry…I guess you're right.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:147}); // {Barret}
“C'mon, {Cloud}!
Don't #&$* around!”{PAUSE}“We're goin' to Junon!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:148}); // {Barret}
“Them Shinras think they're gonna
fight Meteor with the Huge Materia?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:149}); // {Barret}
“Damn, it kinda makes me sad…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:150}); // {Barret}
“That Bugenhagen guy…
He was a weird old dude.”{PAUSE}“I used to think he was a naturalist,
but he was all into them machines.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:151}); // {Barret}
“And {Aeris}…she's dead.”{PAUSE}“Guess she turned into Spiritual Energy
and returned to the Planet, huh?”{PAUSE}“But even if she did, there's no
way we'll meet her again…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:152}); // {Barret}
“Whacha gonna do, {Cloud}?
Got any good ideas?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:153}); // {Barret}
“That damn Weapon…
He's one big *&$*&%$…”{PAUSE}“Even Midgar's in trouble now.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:154}); // {Barret}
“When AVALANCHE was startin' out,
we used to put up flyers everywhere.”{PAUSE}“And now, we're up against Sephiroth.
How about that?”{PAUSE}“Feels like a long time ago.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:155}); // {Barret}
“Comin' and goin'…
gettin' pushed around.”{PAUSE}“But I got a debt to all them back in Midgar
that I can't never repay…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:156}); // {Barret}
“Heh heh heh…
Time's got a way of sneakin' up on ya, huh?”{PAUSE}“I'm shakin' all over…
Heh heh…I feel sick…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:16}); // {Barret}
“What a bust…
But I kinda hoped it'd work.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:21}); // {Barret}
“You're pretty damn optimistic !
You up to somethin'?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:32}); // {Barret}
“Yo! {Cid}!
You even got to me!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:33}); // {Barret}
“Now what?
How're we gonna protect
the Planet from Meteor?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:55}); // {Barret}
“Hey! What's gonna happen to Marlene!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:61}); // {Barret}
“…that was for the life of the Planet.
Ya gotta expect a few casualties.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:64}); // {Barret}
“I don't wanna hear that
from no one in Shinra…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:87}); // {Barret}
“Don't think you're gonna
lose before ya even fight!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:94}); // {Barret}
“You're right…”{PAUSE}“It sounds cool sayin' it's
to save the Planet.”{PAUSE}“But I was the one who
blew up that Mako reactor……”{PAUSE}“Lookin' back on it now, I can see
that wasn't the right way to do things.”{PAUSE}“I made a lot of friends and innocent
bystanders suffer…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:95}); // {Barret}
“…At first, it was revenge against Shinra.
For attackin' my town.”{PAUSE}“But now…”{PAUSE}“Yeah.
I'm fightin' for Marlene.”{PAUSE}“For Marlene…
For Marlene's future…”{PAUSE}“Yeah…I guess I want to save
the Planet for Marlene's sake…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:119}); // {Barret}
Ain't no one wanna be thanked by you!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:157}); // {Red XIII}
“I'm glad you're back with us!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:158}); // {Red XIII}
“Shinra only cares if things are good right now.”{PAUSE}“But, I plan to live for 500 years and
won't stand for that type of thinking.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:159}); // {Red XIII}
“Yes.
We have to think about what to do.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:160}); // {Red XIII}
“Hurry, hurry!
We must go meet Grandfather!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:161}); // {Red XIII}
“{Aeris} used to pat me
on the nose sometimes.”{PAUSE}“I used to hate being treated
like a child like that,
but I also liked the attention.”{PAUSE}“I wanted to apologize to her
for what I did when we first met.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:162}); // {Red XIII}
“If I were more of an adult, perhaps
I would have a better idea of what to do?”{PAUSE}“Whew…I wish I could grow up.”{PAUSE}“I wonder if after all this is over,
will I be an adult?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:163}); // {Red XIII}
“Midgar…”{PAUSE}“I hated the fact I was caught by
Hojo and taken back
to the lab where they did all
kinds of experiments on me…”{PAUSE}“But because of that
I was able to meet you all…”{PAUSE}“People you want to meet…
others you don't…strange isn't it?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:164}); // {Red XIII}
“Will we save the world if we beat Sephiroth?”{PAUSE}“I'm frightened, but I'll do my best.
Let's hurry to the Northern Cave!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:165}); // {Red XIII}
“I wonder why Hojo performed
so many of these experiments?”{PAUSE}“Why couldn't he content himself
with quiet research?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:166}); // {Red XIII}
“I am Nanaki, son of Seto…
I am afraid of nothing…”{PAUSE}“It's all right, all right.
I'm Nanaki, the son of brave Seto…
I'm not afraid of Sephiroth…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:18}); // {Red XIII}
“Makes you worry, doesn't it?”

“Let's go see Grandfather!
To {CYAN}Cosmo Canyon{WHITE}!”{PAUSE}“I'm sure he'll be able to tell us

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:117}); // {Yuffie}
I stuck in there even when I was
pukin' from bein' so seasick.
But if you think I stuck
through all this
just to make off with
everything when the time's right,
forget it. That's not my style.”
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:16, type:1, adjust:255});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:50}); // {Cait Sith}
“That was a surprise,
the controls went crazy.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:52}); // {Cait Sith}
“Weapon came out of the sea and
is heading straight for Midgar.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:54}); // {Cait Sith}
“I don't know if it's ready or not…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:56}); // {Cait Sith}
“Doncha worry none, Marlene's in a safe place.
She's with {Aeris}'s mama.”

ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:58}); // {Cait Sith}
“What was that scratching just now!?”{PAUSE}“As long as Marlene is safe,
who cares what else happens, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:59}); // {Cait Sith}
“I been itchin' to say this
to you for a while now!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:60}); // {Cait Sith}
“When you blew up the Sec.1 reactor
how many do you think died?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:62}); // {Cait Sith}
“A few? Whaddya mean 'a few'?
What may be a few to you
is everything to those who died…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:63}); // {Cait Sith}
“Protect the Planet.
Hah! That sure sounds good!”{PAUSE}“And no one will go against you.
So you think you can do
whatever you want, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:65}); // {Cait Sith}
“Can't do anything about that…”
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:2, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:176}); // {Cait Sith}
“This is kind of sudden,
but shouldn't we get to Junon!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:177}); // {Cait Sith}
“The Shinra are all gathered
at {Cid}'s Rocket Town…”{PAUSE}“…I love giving out secrets
more than anything.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:178}); // {Cait Sith}
“…That's not to say I don't know
how the President feels.”{PAUSE}“But, I can't shake the feeling he's
rushin' things a bit…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:180}); // {Cait Sith}
“Just between you and me…”{PAUSE}“That Bugenhagen used
to be a Shinra worker.”{PAUSE}“He never bought any
weapons or Mako though…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:181}); // {Cait Sith}
“I told {Aeris}'s Mom about her
death.”{PAUSE} “Elmyra was cried herself silly…
So did little Marlene…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:182}); // {Cait Sith}
“Lately, they don't call me to meetings.
Probably because you know I'm a spy.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:183}); // {Cait Sith}
“{Cloud}, you make sure
and do your best!”{PAUSE}“I know you can't forgive the
Shinra, but the people
in Midgar haven't done any wrong!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:184}); // {Cait Sith}
“…Wonder what Sephiroth's up to?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:185}); // {Cait Sith}
“I can't apologize to you enough.”{PAUSE}“If I was a better person,
none of this would have happened…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:188}); // {Cait Sith}
“But I won't forget,
no matter what happens.”{PAUSE}“Not about this here trip,
or them folks--none of it!”

ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:17}); // {Cait Sith}
“We been botherin' them as much as we can…”{PAUSE}“But there ain't no other way…
Wonder if we've been wrong all this time?”
fade({r:128, g:0, b:0, speed:16, type:2, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:16, type:1, adjust:255});
fade({r:200, g:0, b:0, speed:16, type:2, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:13}); // {Cait Sith}
“Listen, {Cloud}.”{PAUSE}“We're right in the middle of the
mission for the Huge Materia, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // {Cait Sith}
“I know this's kinda outta the blue, but
{CYAN}Junon{WHITE} has an {CYAN}Underwater Reactor{WHITE}.”{PAUSE}“As far as I can see,
that's the only one left.”{PAUSE}“That's that. Let's go!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:167}); // {Vincent}
“Escape from a world of illusions…
Hmph…I wonder which is better…?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:168}); // {Vincent}
“…how does it feel, {Cloud}?
living for no one but yourself?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:168}); // {Vincent}
“…how does it feel, {Cloud}?
living for no one but yourself?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:170}); // {Vincent}
“The machines in Cosmo Canyon
were presents of Dr. Gast.”{PAUSE}“Wrapped up in the Planet's strange notions
surrounded by Shinra-made machines…”{PAUSE}“Science and the Planet lived
side by side in that old man's heart.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:171}); // {Vincent}
“City of the Ancients…”{PAUSE}“The Ancients…in time that is probably
what later generations will call us.”{PAUSE}“Hmm…hwa ha ha ha…
It's only a matter of time for us.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:169}); // {Vincent}
“…feelings alone aren't enough.
…it's irritating, isn't it {Cloud}?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:172}); // {Vincent}
“……we still can't seem to get near Sephiroth…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:173}); // {Vincent}
“Kill Sephiroth…
Killing the son of my beloved woman…”{PAUSE}“Am I on the verge of committing
another sin?”{PAUSE}“Or am I atoning as best
I can for only standing by?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:174}); // {Vincent}
“Hojo…what a queer fellow.”{PAUSE}“Such utter lack of scientific talent…
compared with the genius of Dr. Gast…”{PAUSE}“Lucrecia chose him in order to protect him.”{PAUSE}“Now I understand…
I understand…but…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:175}); // {Vincent}
“{Cloud}…take the ship to
the Northern Cave.”{PAUSE}“The time for flying is now past.”{PAUSE}“Our battlefield is now
beneath the earth…”{PAUSE}“The gate to tomorrow is not
the light of heaven,
but the darkness of the depths of the earth.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:189}); // {Cid}
“I know how tough it is bein' a leader,
because I've been one.”{PAUSE}“I always forget who has what Materia.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:190}); // {Cid}
“You said there's somethin'
goin' on at Rocket Town…?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:191}); // {Cid}
“I TOLD you I was thinkin' about it!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:192}); // {Cid}
“Maybe it's just me, but has this ship been
remodeled without me knowin' it?”{PAUSE}“All these switches and levers.
They're kinda gettin' to me.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:193}); // {Cid}
“{Aeris}?”{PAUSE}“I wanted to give her a ride in the Highwind…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:194}); // {Cid}
“Phew…{Cloud}.
What're we gonna do?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:196}); // {Cid}
“That reminds me of a test rocket that
landed in the Midgar Slums long ago.”{PAUSE}“I remember how relieved I was
when I heard it never blew up.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:197}); // {Cid}
“Maybe this is the time?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:198}); // {Cid}
“This runnin' back and forth is tough!”{PAUSE}“Even my bikini goddess
would be pantin' about now!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:208}); // {Cid}
“When this job's done,
I'm landing the ship…yeah, that's what I'll do.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:200}); // “Yeah, I figured someone like you wouldn't be
much on plays.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:201}); // “Yeah? Really?
Well, that's fine.”{PAUSE}“They've been doin' that play
every summer since I was a kid.”{PAUSE}“An' I remember seein' it just once…”{PAUSE}“That was when I was in Midgar
training to be a pilot.”{PAUSE}“I had some free time and
thought I'd catch the play.”{PAUSE}“Now, I'm no big fan of
the theater or anything.”{PAUSE}“But this thing put me to sleep,
just like I thought it would.”{PAUSE}“Finally during the last scene,
the guy next to me
woke me up tellin'
me my snorin' was too loud.”{PAUSE}“So about all I really remember
of that play is the end…”{PAUSE}“When the sister of the lead
asks her lover,”
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:202}); // “Do you really have to leave?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:204}); // “I made a promise.
The people I love are waiting.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:205}); // “…I don't understand.
Not at all. But, take care of yourself.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:206}); // “Of course…I'll come back to you.
Even if you don't promise to wait. I'll return
knowing you'll be here.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:207}); // {Cid}
“I remember thinking when I heard those lines,”{PAUSE}What the hell's he talkin' about?
But, you know…now I'm not so sure…”{PAUSE}“I think I understand…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:20}); // {Cid}
“Hey!
The girl's right.”{PAUSE}“You start worryin' and there's no stoppin' it!
Things just start fallin' apart and get
worse and worse.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:22}); // {Cid}
“Yeah, I been thinkin' about this and that.”{PAUSE}“All the time we been up here
lookin' at the planet.”{PAUSE}“I been thinkin' even when we were floatin'
in the ocean in that escape pod.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:25}); // {Cid}
“But I came up with something different.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:26}); // {Cid}
“I always thought this Planet was so huge.”{PAUSE}“But lookin' at it from space,
I realized it's so small.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:27}); // {Cid}
“We're just floatin' in the dark.
……kind of makes you feel powerless.”{PAUSE}“On top of that it's got Sephiroth
festerin' inside it like a sickness.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:28}); // {Cid}
“That's why I say this Planet's still a kid.”{PAUSE}“A little kid sick and trembling
in the middle of this huge universe.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:30}); // {Cid}
“Ya follow me?
That someone is us.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:34}); // {Cid}
“…I'm still thinkin' about that.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:73}); // {Cid}
“Hey {Cloud}…”{PAUSE}“You think we can win against that monster?
We got a chance of winnin', right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:120}); // {Cid}
So, what's next.
Now that everyone's here.
What're you going to do?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:98}); // {Cid}
“Maybe ain't none of us'll come back.”{PAUSE}“Meteor's gonna kill us all anyway.
Let's just forget any useless struggling!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:209}); // “Sorry, I'm in the middle of a very
delicate operation!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:210}); // “Ahhhhh!
Oh no, oh no, oh no!”

“{Cloud}, what do you want to do?”

{Cait Sith}
“Listen, {Cloud}.”{PAUSE}“We're right in the middle of the
mission for the Huge Materia, right?”

{Cait Sith}
“I know this's kinda outta the blue, but
{CYAN}Junon{WHITE} has an {CYAN}Underwater Reactor{WHITE}.”{PAUSE}“As far as I can see,
that's the only one left.”{PAUSE}“That's that. Let's go!”

{Cloud}
“Rufus and the other's plan was a failure…”

{Barret}
“What a bust…
But I kinda hoped it'd work.”

{Cait Sith}
“We been botherin' them as much as we can…”{PAUSE}“But there ain't no other way…
Wonder if we've been wrong all this time?”

{Red XIII}
“Makes you worry, doesn't it?”

{Tifa}
“Don't worry! Think!”

{Cid}
“Hey!
The girl's right.”{PAUSE}“You start worryin' and there's no stoppin' it!
Things just start fallin' apart and get
worse and worse.”

{Barret}
“You're pretty damn optimistic !
You up to somethin'?”

{Cid}
“Yeah, I been thinkin' about this and that.”{PAUSE}“All the time we been up here
lookin' at the planet.”{PAUSE}“I been thinkin' even when we were floatin'
in the ocean in that escape pod.”

{Cloud}
“I've…been thinking, too.
About the universe…planet…ocean.”{PAUSE}“How wide and big…
No matter where I go and what I do
it won't change a thing.”

{Cid}
“Maybe you're right.”

{Cid}
“But I came up with something different.”

{Cid}
“I always thought this Planet was so huge.”{PAUSE}“But lookin' at it from space,
I realized it's so small.”

{Cid}
“We're just floatin' in the dark.
……kind of makes you feel powerless.”{PAUSE}“On top of that it's got Sephiroth
festerin' inside it like a sickness.”

{Cid}
“That's why I say this Planet's still a kid.”{PAUSE}“A little kid sick and trembling
in the middle of this huge universe.”

{Cid}
“Someone's gotta protect it.”

{Cid}
“Ya follow me?
That someone is us.”

{Tifa}
“{Cid}…that's beautiful.”

{Barret}
“Yo! {Cid}!
You even got to me!”

{Barret}
“Now what?
How're we gonna protect
the Planet from Meteor?”

{Cid}
“…I'm still thinkin' about that.”

{Red XIII}
“Huh!?”

{Red XIII}
“Did you…hear something?”

{Cloud}
“What is it?”

{Tifa}
“Maybe it's the Planet's scream…
Or is it Meteor?”

{Cloud}
“It's the Planet's scream.
I'm sure of it.”

{Cloud}
“Hey, how do we know that this is
really the Planet's scream?”

{Tifa}
“Did you forget?”{PAUSE}“Bugenhagen told us.”

{Cloud}
“Bugenhagen…”

{Red XIII}
“Let's go see Grandfather!
To {CYAN}Cosmo Canyon{WHITE}!”{PAUSE}“I'm sure he'll be able to tell us
something that will be helpful!”

{Cid}
“What's wrong!?”
“It's a strange signal!”

{Cid}
“From where?”
“It's coming from this…person (?)”

{Cait Sith}
“Wow!”

{Cait Sith}
“Hey!”

{Cait Sith}
“That was a surprise,
the controls went crazy.”

{Cait Sith}
“This ain't good…”

{Cait Sith}
“Weapon came out of the sea and
is heading straight for Midgar.”

{Cloud}
“The new weapon should stop him, right?”

{Cait Sith}
“I don't know if it's ready or not…”

{Barret}
“Hey! What's gonna happen to Marlene!?”

{Cait Sith}
“Doncha worry none, Marlene's in a safe place.
She's with {Aeris}'s mama.”

{Cait Sith}
“{Barret}!!”

{Cait Sith}
“What was that scratching just now!?”{PAUSE}“As long as Marlene is safe,
who cares what else happens, right?”

{Cait Sith}
“I been itchin' to say this
to you for a while now!”

{Cait Sith}
“When you blew up the Sec.1 reactor
how many do you think died?”

{Barret}
“…that was for the life of the Planet.
Ya gotta expect a few casualties.”

{Cait Sith}
“A few? Whaddya mean 'a few'?
What may be a few to you
is everything to those who died…”

{Cait Sith}
“Protect the Planet.
Hah! That sure sounds good!”{PAUSE}“And no one will go against you.
So you think you can do
whatever you want, right?”

{Barret}
“I don't wanna hear that
from no one in Shinra…”

{Cait Sith}
“Can't do anything about that…”

{Cloud}
“Stop it!”

{Tifa}
“{Cait Sith}…
{Barret}, he knows what he did.”{PAUSE}“What we did in Midgar can't be forgotten
no matter what the reason.”

{Tifa}
“Right?
We haven't forgotten, right?”

{Tifa}
“I know you.”{PAUSE}“You can't quit the company because you're
worried about the people in Midgar, right?”

{Tifa}
“…{Cloud}?”

{Cloud}
“Weapon?”

{Cloud}
“OK! Let's go!
We'll beat Weapon ourselves!”

{Cid}
“Hey {Cloud}…”{PAUSE}“You think we can win against that monster?
We got a chance of winnin', right?”

{Cloud}
“How would I know?”{PAUSE}“But that's no reason for us
to just let him go!”{PAUSE}“We're goin' to {CYAN}Midgar{WHITE} and fight Weapon!
Come on, let's move!”

{Cloud}
“What happened to Sephiroth?”

{Cloud}
“Northern Cave…”{PAUSE}“Let's go see what
happened to it.”

{Cait Sith}
“Shinra's…finished.”

{Cloud}
“Meteor's gonna fall in about…”

{Red XIII}
“Seven more days.
That's what Grandfather said.”

{Cloud}
“{Red XIII}…”{PAUSE}“You want to see everyone in
Cosmo Canyon again?”

{Red XIII}
“…Yes.”

{Cloud}
“You want to see Marlene, right?”

{Barret}
“Don't ask me that.”

{Cloud}
“We'll beat Sephiroth…”{PAUSE}“Then, if we don't release
the power of Holy in seven days…”{PAUSE}“There won't be
a Planet left to protect.”

{Cloud}
“If we can't beat Sephiroth…”{PAUSE}“It's as good as death for us.”{PAUSE}“We'll just go a few days sooner
than the rest who'll die from Meteor.”

{Barret}
“Don't think you're gonna
lose before ya even fight!”

{Cloud}
“No!”

{Cloud}
“What I meant was…”

{Cloud}
“What are we all fighting for?
I want us all to understand that.”{PAUSE}“Save the Planet…for the future of the Planet…
Sure, that's all fine.”{PAUSE}“But really, is that how it is?”

{Cloud}
“For me, this is a personal feud.”{PAUSE}“I want to beat Sephiroth
and settle my past.”{PAUSE}“Saving the Planet just happens
to be part of that.”

{Cloud}
“I've been thinking.”

{Cloud}
“I think we all are
fighting for ourselves.”{PAUSE}“For ourselves…and that someone…
something…whatever
it is, that's important to us.”{PAUSE}“That's what we're fighting for.”{PAUSE}“That's why we keep up this
battle for the Planet.”

{Barret}
“You're right…”{PAUSE}“It sounds cool sayin' it's
to save the Planet.”{PAUSE}“But I was the one who
blew up that Mako reactor……”{PAUSE}“Lookin' back on it now, I can see
that wasn't the right way to do things.”{PAUSE}“I made a lot of friends and innocent
bystanders suffer…”

{Barret}
“…At first, it was revenge against Shinra.
For attackin' my town.”{PAUSE}“But now…”{PAUSE}“Yeah.
I'm fightin' for Marlene.”{PAUSE}“For Marlene…
For Marlene's future…”{PAUSE}“Yeah…I guess I want to save
the Planet for Marlene's sake…”

{Cloud}
“Go and see her.
Make sure you're right, and come back.”

{Cloud}
“All of you. Get off the ship
and find out your reasons for yourselves.”{PAUSE}“I want you to make sure.
Then I want you to come back.”

{Cid}
“Maybe ain't none of us'll come back.”{PAUSE}“Meteor's gonna kill us all anyway.
Let's just forget any useless struggling!”

{Cloud}
“I know why I'm fighting.”{PAUSE}“I'm fighting to save the Planet,
and that's that.”{PAUSE}“But besides that, there's
something personal, too…”{PAUSE}“A very personal memory that I have.”{PAUSE}“What about you all?”{PAUSE}“I want all of you to find
that something within yourselves.”{PAUSE}“If you don't find it,
then that's okay, too.”{PAUSE}“You can't fight without
a reason, right?”{PAUSE}“So, I won't hold it against you
if you don't come back.”

{Cloud}
“What are you going to do, {Tifa}?”

{Tifa}
“Did you forget?”{PAUSE}“I'm…all alone.
I don't have anywhere to go.”
{Cloud}
{Cloud}
{Cait Sith}
{Barret}

{Yuffie}
Geez…that's pretty lame.”

{Yuffie}
I stuck in there even when I was
pukin' from bein' so seasick.
But if you think I stuck
through all this
just to make off with
everything when the time's right,
forget it. That's not my style.”

{Cloud}
Thanks, everyone.”

{Barret}
Ain't no one wanna be thanked by you!”

{Cid}
So, what's next.
Now that everyone's here.
What're you going to do?”

{Cloud}
This is our last battle.
Our target is Sephiroth in
the Northern Cave!
So…”

{Cloud}
Let's do it. Come on, everyone!”

{Tifa}
“Let's do our best, {Cloud}!”

{Tifa}
“How are you feeling?”{PAUSE}“You ought to rest a bit…
Don't push yourself.”

{Tifa}
“{Cloud}…what should I do?
I've got to think.”

{Tifa}
“The Planet's…scream.”

{Tifa}
“Did Bugenhagen…tell you anything?”

{Tifa}
“I wonder what {Aeris} felt…
when she was on that altar…?”

{Cloud}
“I'm sure she wanted to give
her life for the Planet.”

{Tifa}
“Really? I wonder?
I don't think that was it.”{PAUSE}“I don't think she wanted to die at all,
but was planning on coming back all along.”

“She always used to talk
about the 'next time'.”{PAUSE}“She talked about the future
more than any of us…”

{Tifa}
“Although she never said anything to us
about it, she must've had a rough life.”{PAUSE}“I think {Aeris} looked
forward to tomorrow and
the future more than anyone…”{PAUSE}“…she must've had many
many dreams…”

{Tifa}
“{Cloud}…”

{Tifa}
“Whether you love it or hate it…”{PAUSE}“You just can't bring yourself
to leave Midgar, can you?”

{Tifa}
“Now we're going to fight Sephiroth.”{PAUSE}“I wonder what the inside of that cave looks like?
You think Sephiroth is just sitting there
waiting for Meteor?”

{Tifa}
“It's all right.”{PAUSE}“You're here…
Everyone's all together”{PAUSE}“Together…we can do anything.
We've worked this hard already.”

{Tifa}
“Hey, {Cloud}…
Would you tell me 'It's all right'?”{PAUSE}{CHOICE}Say it cool
{CHOICE}Say it normal
{CHOICE}Don't say it

{Cloud}
“It's all right, {Tifa}.”

{Cloud}
“…It's all right.”

{Cloud}
“…I just can't say it that easy.”

{Tifa}
“Now I feel like things are really
going to be all right.”{PAUSE}“Thanks, {Cloud}.”

{Tifa}
“You're right, things will be all right.”

{Tifa}
“I'm sorry…I guess you're right.”

{Tifa}
“I'm all right.
I'm not going to chicken out at the last minute.”

{Tifa}
“I'm…all right…really…
I'll fight my hardest…”

{Tifa}
“……Wow.
I guess…I am a little scared.
My knees are trembling.”

{Barret}
“C'mon, {Cloud}!
Don't #&$* around!”{PAUSE}“We're goin' to Junon!!”

{Barret}
“Them Shinras think they're gonna
fight Meteor with the Huge Materia?”

{Barret}
“Damn, it kinda makes me sad…”

{Barret}
“That Bugenhagen guy…
He was a weird old dude.”{PAUSE}“I used to think he was a naturalist,
but he was all into them machines.”

{Barret}
“And {Aeris}…she's dead.”{PAUSE}“Guess she turned into Spiritual Energy
and returned to the Planet, huh?”{PAUSE}“But even if she did, there's no
way we'll meet her again…”

{Barret}
“Whacha gonna do, {Cloud}?
Got any good ideas?”

{Barret}
“That damn Weapon…
He's one big *&$*&%$…”{PAUSE}“Even Midgar's in trouble now.”

{Barret}
“When AVALANCHE was startin' out,
we used to put up flyers everywhere.”{PAUSE}“And now, we're up against Sephiroth.
How about that?”{PAUSE}“Feels like a long time ago.”

{Barret}
“Comin' and goin'…
gettin' pushed around.”{PAUSE}“But I got a debt to all them back in Midgar
that I can't never repay…”

{Barret}
“Heh heh heh…
Time's got a way of sneakin' up on ya, huh?”{PAUSE}“I'm shakin' all over…
Heh heh…I feel sick…”

{Red XIII}
“I'm glad you're back with us!”

{Red XIII}
“Shinra only cares if things are good right now.”{PAUSE}“But, I plan to live for 500 years and
won't stand for that type of thinking.”

{Red XIII}
“Yes.
We have to think about what to do.”

{Red XIII}
“Hurry, hurry!
We must go meet Grandfather!”

{Red XIII}
“{Aeris} used to pat me
on the nose sometimes.”{PAUSE}“I used to hate being treated
like a child like that,
but I also liked the attention.”{PAUSE}“I wanted to apologize to her
for what I did when we first met.”

{Red XIII}
“If I were more of an adult, perhaps
I would have a better idea of what to do?”{PAUSE}“Whew…I wish I could grow up.”{PAUSE}“I wonder if after all this is over,
will I be an adult?”

{Red XIII}
“Midgar…”{PAUSE}“I hated the fact I was caught by
Hojo and taken back
to the lab where they did all
kinds of experiments on me…”{PAUSE}“But because of that
I was able to meet you all…”{PAUSE}“People you want to meet…
others you don't…strange isn't it?”

{Red XIII}
“Will we save the world if we beat Sephiroth?”{PAUSE}“I'm frightened, but I'll do my best.
Let's hurry to the Northern Cave!”

{Red XIII}
“I wonder why Hojo performed
so many of these experiments?”{PAUSE}“Why couldn't he content himself
with quiet research?”

{Red XIII}
“I am Nanaki, son of Seto…
I am afraid of nothing…”{PAUSE}“It's all right, all right.
I'm Nanaki, the son of brave Seto…
I'm not afraid of Sephiroth…”

{Vincent}
“Escape from a world of illusions…
Hmph…I wonder which is better…?”

{Vincent}
“…how does it feel, {Cloud}?
living for no one but yourself?”

{Vincent}
“…feelings alone aren't enough.
…it's irritating, isn't it {Cloud}?”

{Vincent}
“The machines in Cosmo Canyon
were presents of Dr. Gast.”{PAUSE}“Wrapped up in the Planet's strange notions
surrounded by Shinra-made machines…”{PAUSE}“Science and the Planet lived
side by side in that old man's heart.”

{Vincent}
“City of the Ancients…”{PAUSE}“The Ancients…in time that is probably
what later generations will call us.”{PAUSE}“Hmm…hwa ha ha ha…
It's only a matter of time for us.”

{Vincent}
“……we still can't seem to get near Sephiroth…”

{Vincent}
“Kill Sephiroth…
Killing the son of my beloved woman…”{PAUSE}“Am I on the verge of committing
another sin?”{PAUSE}“Or am I atoning as best
I can for only standing by?”

{Vincent}
“Hojo…what a queer fellow.”{PAUSE}“Such utter lack of scientific talent…
compared with the genius of Dr. Gast…”{PAUSE}“Lucrecia chose him in order to protect him.”{PAUSE}“Now I understand…
I understand…but…”

{Vincent}
“{Cloud}…take the ship to
the Northern Cave.”{PAUSE}“The time for flying is now past.”{PAUSE}“Our battlefield is now
beneath the earth…”{PAUSE}“The gate to tomorrow is not
the light of heaven,
but the darkness of the depths of the earth.”

{Cait Sith}
“This is kind of sudden,
but shouldn't we get to Junon!?”

{Cait Sith}
“The Shinra are all gathered
at {Cid}'s Rocket Town…”{PAUSE}“…I love giving out secrets
more than anything.”

{Cait Sith}
“…That's not to say I don't know
how the President feels.”{PAUSE}“But, I can't shake the feeling he's
rushin' things a bit…”

{Cait Sith}
“The life of the Planet…”{PAUSE}“Which was screaming?
The Planet? Or Meteor?”

{Cait Sith}
“Just between you and me…”{PAUSE}“That Bugenhagen used
to be a Shinra worker.”{PAUSE}“He never bought any
weapons or Mako though…”

{Cait Sith}
“I told {Aeris}'s Mom about her
death.”{PAUSE} “Elmyra was cried herself silly…
So did little Marlene…”

{Cait Sith}
“Lately, they don't call me to meetings.
Probably because you know I'm a spy.”

{Cait Sith}
“{Cloud}, you make sure
and do your best!”{PAUSE}“I know you can't forgive the
Shinra, but the people
in Midgar haven't done any wrong!”

{Cait Sith}
“…Wonder what Sephiroth's up to?”

{Cait Sith}
“I can't apologize to you enough.”{PAUSE}“If I was a better person,
none of this would have happened…”

“So let's get over it!
We've got to hurry to the slums!”{PAUSE}“Are you all right?
You say you lost your son?”

{Cait Sith}
“Hey, {Cloud}!”{PAUSE}“The people ought to just about be
to safety in the slums by now.”{PAUSE}“Maybe we were all just kidding ourselves.”

{Cait Sith}
“But I won't forget,
no matter what happens.”{PAUSE}“Not about this here trip,
or them folks--none of it!”

{Cid}
“I know how tough it is bein' a leader,
because I've been one.”{PAUSE}“I always forget who has what Materia.”

{Cid}
“You said there's somethin'
goin' on at Rocket Town…?”

{Cid}
“I TOLD you I was thinkin' about it!”

{Cid}
“Maybe it's just me, but has this ship been
remodeled without me knowin' it?”{PAUSE}“All these switches and levers.
They're kinda gettin' to me.”

{Cid}
“{Aeris}?”{PAUSE}“I wanted to give her a ride in the Highwind…”

{Cid}
“Phew…{Cloud}.
What're we gonna do?”

{Cid}
“Well, I guess it's time for Sephiroth.
Are your hearts pounding?”

{Cid}
“That reminds me of a test rocket that
landed in the Midgar Slums long ago.”{PAUSE}“I remember how relieved I was
when I heard it never blew up.”

{Cid}
“Maybe this is the time?”

{Cid}
“This runnin' back and forth is tough!”{PAUSE}“Even my bikini goddess
would be pantin' about now!”

{Cid}
“You ever see
the play 'LOVELESS'?”{PAUSE}{CHOICE}No
{CHOICE}Yes

“Yeah, I figured someone like you wouldn't be
much on plays.”

“Yeah? Really?
Well, that's fine.”{PAUSE}“They've been doin' that play
every summer since I was a kid.”{PAUSE}“An' I remember seein' it just once…”{PAUSE}“That was when I was in Midgar
training to be a pilot.”{PAUSE}“I had some free time and
thought I'd catch the play.”{PAUSE}“Now, I'm no big fan of
the theater or anything.”{PAUSE}“But this thing put me to sleep,
just like I thought it would.”{PAUSE}“Finally during the last scene,
the guy next to me
woke me up tellin'
me my snorin' was too loud.”{PAUSE}“So about all I really remember
of that play is the end…”{PAUSE}“When the sister of the lead
asks her lover,”
“Do you really have to leave?”

{Cid}
“And the guy says,”

“I made a promise.
The people I love are waiting.”

“…I don't understand.
Not at all. But, take care of yourself.”

“Of course…I'll come back to you.
Even if you don't promise to wait. I'll return
knowing you'll be here.”

{Cid}
“I remember thinking when I heard those lines,”{PAUSE}What the hell's he talkin' about?
But, you know…now I'm not so sure…”{PAUSE}“I think I understand…”

{Cid}
“When this job's done,
I'm landing the ship…yeah, that's what I'll do.”

“Sorry, I'm in the middle of a very
delicate operation!”

“Ahhhhh!
Oh no, oh no, oh no!”
